price: 139. Diggah tama maray ama numtinwwellitteh amol qibaadah daffeya usun edde yaniinim tu hinna finqitte taamak kal, usun tama numtinwwellittet abak sugen Qibaadá deedal taama kinni.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
